Lyrics:
1 ContributorRock Bottom Lyrics[Verse 1]
Something in the water going down the drain
Something 'bout the smoke when I’m going up in flames
Soul of a sinner with the skin of a saint
Somebody save me, but no one get in my way

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m sinking
I’m seeing the ceiling disappearing

[Chorus]
Come on, crash and burn with me
Find the straight and narrow staring down the barrel
Come on, feel that third degree
Nothing like falling from rags to rock bottom
Come on

[Verse 2]
It’s in my DNA to go against the grain
Gimme blurry lines over stayin in my lane
Drag it, shout it, it’s all the same
'Cause the marquis sign still says my name

[Chorus]
Come on, crash and burn with me
Find the straight and narrow staring down the barrel
Come on, feel that third degree
Nothing like falling from rags to rock bottom
Come on
You might also like[Bridge]
I’m sinking
I’m seeing the ceiling disappearing

[Breakdown]
From rags to rock bottom
From rags to rock bottom

[Chorus]
Come on, crash and burn with me
Find the straight and narrow staring down the barrel
Come on, feel that third degree
Nothing like falling from rags to rock bottom
Come on, crash and burn with me
Find the straight and narrow staring down the barrel
Come on, feel that third degree
Nothing like falling from rags to rock bottom

[Outro]
Nothing like falling from rags to rock bottom
Come onEmbed
